content.en: Plasma algorithm analysis: Scientists are using algorithms to answer various research questions in the field of plasma physics. These algorithms include grid-based constrained optimization methods, maximum entropy reconstruction algorithms, wavelength-and time-resolved plasma emission tomography, tomographic reconstruction with a MART algorithm, and many others. By applying these algorithms, researchers are able to analyze and understand complex phenomena in plasma physics, such as impurity transport, beam density distribution, thermal plasma temperatures, and asymmetries in plasma implosions.
content.da: Plasma-algoritmeanalyse: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for plasmafysik. Disse algoritmer inkluderer gitterbaserede begrænsede optimeringsmetoder, maksimeringsalgoritmer for entropirekonstruktion, bølgelængde- og tidsopløst plasmaemissionstomografi, tomografisk rekonstruktion med en MART-algoritme og mange andre. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer kan forskere analysere og forstå komplekse fænomener i plasmafysik, såsom forureningstransport, stråletæthedsfordeling, termiske plasmatemperaturer og asymmetrier i plasmaimplosioner.
